definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: More concerning is the presence of additives in some types of commercially prepared kimchi.
sentences.chinese: 更让人担忧的是韩国泡菜中的食品添加剂。

sentences.english: Do you like kimchi ? It's my favorite.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢韩国泡菜吗﹖是我的最爱。

sentences.english: Kimchi has been previously rated one the world's top 5 healthiest foods.
sentences.chinese: 韩国泡菜最近被评为了世界五佳健康食品之一。

sentences.english: I started my meal with Korea' s most famous food-kimchi.
sentences.chinese: 我以一款韩国最著名的韩国泡菜来开始我的美食行动。

sentences.english: Be careful what you say about kimchi in Pyongyang.
sentences.chinese: 在平壤，讲到韩国泡菜时要小心。

definition: gimbap (Korean rice roll similar in appearance to sushi)/kimbap
zha jiang mian: ground pork simmered with salty fermented soybean paste (or other sauce) over thick wheat noodles
nian gao, New Year cake, typically a sweet, steamed cake made with glutinous rice flour
